options.content:
# Lighthouse Metrics

Metrics collected from a Lighthouse Beacon Node.

### Consensus

Overview of consensus between nodes.

panels.description: The number of attesters for which we have seen an attestation. That attestation is not necessarily included in the chain.
panels.title: Previous Epoch Observed Attesters

panels.description: The number of aggregators for which we have seen an attestation. That attestation is not necessarily included in the chain.
panels.title: Previous Epoch Observed Aggregators

options.content:
### Core BeaconChain Functions

Timing of core `BeaconChain` functions and syncing.

panels.description: Time taken to calculate the tree hash root of a BeaconState during block processing.
panels.title: Block Tree Hash Times (5m avg)

panels.description: Time taken to calculate the tree hash root of a BeaconState during block processing.
panels.title: State Tree Hash Times (5m avg)

options.content:
### Database

Stats about the on-disk database (LevelDB)

panels.description: Time taken to calculate the tree hash root of a BeaconState during block processing.
panels.title: Persist Beacon Chain Times (1m avg)
